    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cindersoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2552) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 102 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

The fire of your elemental ancestor manifests like dying embers of a blaze, and your inner charcoal helps staunch bleeding, purify simple poisons, and absorb acid. The DC for you to recover from [persistent acid, bleed, and poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) is 10 instead of 15 (or 5 if you have particularly effective assistance).
name: Cindersoul
